caption: This photograph captures a large industrial mining truck, loaded with dirt, driving on a gravel road. The truck is exceptionally large with massive, rugged tires and a hefty, rectangular dump bed loaded with earth. It features a dark green cabin and body with a prominent black grille at the front, displaying the model name “Dart.” The terrain surrounding the truck appears to be a barren excavation site with piles of dirt or rubble to the left and a wider open dusty landscape stretching into the distance. The sky is clear blue, indicating that it might be a sunny day, which enhances the visibility of dust being kicked up by the truck's movement. The overall scene conveys a sense of heavy-duty industrial activity, likely associated with construction or mining operations.
title: Coal company truck used to haul large loads from the strip mining sites to the processing plant near Chandlersville, in southeastern Ohio
